title: Police: The 13-year-old girl was beheaded after seeing her grandmother die.
subtitle: The head of a 13-year-old girl with special needs was cut off because she saw her grandmother being killed in a cemetery, according to the testimony of the court.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: A 13-year-old girl was decapitated by an "illegal immigrant" in a "depressing" crime by the mainstream media.
